data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 3, Goal! Shinzo Koroki gives Urawa a 0-1 lead.
Great play from Quenten Martinus to set up the goal.
Yuya Asano of Hiroshima gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 6, Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
Yuya Asano for Hiroshima gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Urawa have a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Throw-in Urawa.
Free kick Hiroshima.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Urawa.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Hiroshima close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Urawa at EDION Stadium.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 12, Hiroshima's Toshihiro Aoyama gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hiroshima.
Free kick for Hiroshima in the half of Urawa.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Urawa at EDION Stadium.
Hiroshima's Leandro Pereira attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards Urawa a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Nobutsugu Murakami awards the home team a throw-in.
Urawa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
In the minute 22, Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leandro Pereira (Hiroshima) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Hiroshima pushes forward through Sho Sasaki, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 24, Hiroshima have a dangerous throw-in.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Urawa in their own half.
Urawa's Kazuki Nagasawa gets in a shot on goal at EDION Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 31, Urawa push forward at EDION Stadium and Shinzo Koroki gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Hiroshima defence.
Urawa have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Urawa to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
In the minute 33, Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Urawa's half?
Ball safe as Urawa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Hiroshima a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 36, Nobutsugu Murakami awards Urawa a goal kick.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Urawa's half.
Hiroshima are coming forward and Leandro Pereira gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 39, Urawa have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hiroshima.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Hiroshima in their own half.
Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
Urawa's Shinzo Koroki is whistled for offside at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 45, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Urawa.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Hiroshima.
Throw-in Urawa.
In Hiroshima Urawa attack through Quenten Martinus. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 49, Goal kick for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Urawa in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Urawa in the half of Hiroshima.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
Tomoya Ugajin (Urawa) has received a yellow card from Nobutsugu Murakami.
In the minute 53, Throw-in high up the field for Hiroshima in Hiroshima.
Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Toshihiro Aoyama (Hiroshima) gets a yellow card.
Urawaâ€™s Quenten Martinus is on his feet again at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 54, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Quenten Martinus.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
In the minute 57, Free kick Hiroshima.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards Urawa a goal kick.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Urawa territory.
In the minute 60, Yuya Asano (Hiroshima) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
In the minute 60, Urawa have a goal kick.
Hiroshi Jofuku is making the team's first substitution at EDION Stadium with Douglas Vieira replacing Yuya Asano.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Urawa.
It seems as if Quenten Martinus is unable to continue. Takahiro Sekine replaces him for the away team.
In the minute 62, The away team have replaced Yuki Muto with Kenyu Sugimoto. This is the second substitution made today by Tsuyoshi Otsuki.
Urawa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
In the minute 64, Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 65, In Hiroshima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ewerton for Urawa has been booked by Nobutsugu Murakami and receives a first yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hiroshima.
Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Hiroshima in the half of Urawa.
Yuki Nogami (Hiroshima) strikes at EDION Stadium but his header is cleared.
The away team replace Ewerton with Takuya Aoki.
In the minute 72, Free kick Hiroshima.
In Hiroshima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Hiroshima attack but Leandro Pereira's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 74, Goal kick for Urawa at EDION Stadium.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Urawa in their own half.
Goal! Leandro Pereira equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
In the minute 76, Douglas Vieira with an assist there.
Kosuke Taketomi is replacing Takahiro Sekine for Urawa at EDION Stadium.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
In the minute 82, Nobutsugu Murakami awards Urawa a goal kick.
Ryo Nagai is replacing Yoshifumi Kashiwa for the home team.
Hiroshi Jofuku (Hiroshima) is making a third substitution, with Ezequiel replacing Toshihiro Aoyama.
In the minute 89, Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Hiroshima's Ezequiel has run offside.
That's full-time at EDION Stadium. The final score is 1-1.
